title: Sumo Gragas
body:
Theme: Gragas as a Sumo holding a massive sushi roll and is wearing a black belt

Q: Throws out sushi. Upon explosion will shoot out rice and an abundant amount of toppings like seafood, vegetables, beef, etc.
W: Eats sushi crazily and rice particles fall out. A bit of meat like beef, lamb, etc. fall out too
E: Standard slam, but leaves a small rice trail behind and a bit of seafood toppings like salmon, tuna, etc.
R: KABADABOOM! Sushi explodes everywhere and remains of what used to be it such as seaweed, beef, lamb, lettuce, cheese, beef, etc. all fall out!

That's all I have. Have a nice day.

~Cloudy

replies.body: That's pretty dam cool, nice going{{champion:79}}
This is great. But I think instead of sushi he should have a large flask of sake (Japanese alcoholic drink) It should also change his voice to have a Japanese accent.
